post.title: Markdown Syntax
post.excerpt:
## Introduction

[Markdown](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markdown) is a lightweight markup language for creating formatted text using a plain-text editor.

The syntax of Markdown consists of two parts, [basic](#basic-syntax) and [extended](#extended-syntax).
